name: Oktalyzer Module
summary: Learn about .OKT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Armin Sander developed Oktalyzer in the 1980s, and Mayer Verlag distributed the commercial audio tracker in 1988 for Amiga computers. However, Sander discontinued the software in 1991, with the last version being 1.57.

Although Oktalyzer has been discontinued for many years, you may still encounter old OKT files created by the original application. In addition, you may also receive OKT files created by video game music enthusiasts using a third-party audio tracker.

instructions: You can open an OKT file with many audio applications, including OpenMPT (Windows), Nullsoft Winamp (Windows), DeliPlayer (Windows), and MikMod (multiplatform). To open an OKT file with OpenMPT, select File â†’ Open....
